author: Daniel Greene
description:
FREE TOYS OR GIFT CARDS FOR TOYS! Everyone who signs up to my giveaway with @bellesaco wins something! https://www.shopbboutique.co/vibe/danielgreene-yt This week on Fantasy News, we’ve got a flood of major updates: Brandon Sanderson speaks about The Wheel of Time adaptation, HBO finally reveals the cast for their Harry Potter reboot, and we get our first official look at the Dungeon Crawler Carl webtoon!

Plus: DCC announces fan merch licensing rules, The Devils is being adapted, and we’ve got new books incoming from Ryan Cahill, Brian McClellan, Gollancz, and more. Oh—and yes, there’s a Zelda movie casting rumor featuring Tom Holland, The Rock, and Hunter Schafer. It’s that kind of week.

📚 My Books:
Neon Ghosts: A Witch's Sin Hardcover: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions-1/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcover
Breach of Peace: https://tinyurl.com/BoPTLT
Rebels Creed: https://tinyurl.com/RCTLTDG

👕 Merch & Signed Books: https://www.danielbgreene.com
🧙‍
title: JAMES CAMERON To Adapt Abercrombie's The Devils! Sanderson on WoT’s Fall, New Harry Potter Trio | FN
